pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Images of Volumetric Brain Data in NIfTI Format Using 'ggplot2' Syntax // A 'ggplot2'-consistent approach to generating 2D displays of volumetric brain imaging data. Display data from multiple NIfTI images using standard 'ggplot2' conventions such scales, limits, and themes to control the appearance of displays. The resulting plots are returned as 'patchwork' objects, inheriting from 'ggplot', allowing for any standard modifications of display aesthetics supported by 'ggplot2'.
